document.name: Bank
document.results:
Begin Info
Bank Example

The main purpose of this example is to show you :

  • How to handle business flows using the 'Do With' Interpreter
  • How to convert a String to a Money type using 'Type Conversion'
End Info

Import
info.novatec.testit.livingdoc.confluence.demo.bank
LivingDoc.Confluence.Demo.Bank

Account Management Example
